result.title: First report on the formal specification of sustainable
result.description: D3.1: First report on the formal specification of sustainable and resilient forest management knowledge model: Report on the activities carried out in formalising the semantic framework developed within the project. The various ignition models resulting from six (6) categories namely (i) unknown; (ii) natural; (iii) accidental; (iv) negligence; (v) deliberate and (vi) re-kindle will be addressed. [M12]
